trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Pittsfield
There were no other sightings in Pittsfield on or around September 2nd 2011
Summary: Two planes in sky White light approaches then sped off
divs: sighting detailsi went out front. looked up into the sky. there was an airplane\jet flying east. then a white light came up along side of it fast, it slowed beside the plane, the light then sped east,at a speed i have never seen, made a half circle southward then changed direction to the north. this thing was super fast, unrealistic to me, to fly that fast and change direction so fast. then the ufo took off north all at a speed i cannot describe. then there was a second plane not far behind the first.
